topics.body:
So a Alabama Christian Minister was jailed for 30 days for marrying a lesbian couple.


The amount of irony in this is amazing:
1)Alabama refuses same sex marriage on the grounds of "religious freedom".
2)They jail a Christian Minister for exercising religious freedom.

topics.body: So I've seen three Mamoru Hosoda films. Wolf Children, Summer Wars, and Our War Game. And I think I've realized something. Hosoda is a MASTER of the cry. When characters in Hosoda's films cry it's never a delicate quiet "single tear on the cheek" kind of nonsense. It's always loud, humiliating and kind of uncomfortable to watch. And I think that's the point. These characters arent attractive when they cry because sadness isn't attractive.
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff
